project_abstract.cdata: The project would comprise the construction of: (a) a thermal power station with four 330-MW lignite-fired units, complete with the Jiu river realignment for cooling water intake purposes and flood control, road and rail links for construction and generation purposes; (b) 400-kV and 110-kV transmission lines, about 600-km long, connecting Turceni with Mintia and Brazi substations including a switching station and interconnection with the existing 400-kV system out of Iron Gates I power station.
